text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo This coming from the guy who has done nothing for the country when it comes to the COVID-19 but write stupid tweets and vote no to helping Americans in the time of crisis. We pay this idiot approximately $4000 dollars a week to kiss the presidents ass and make America sicker.
